fields.title: Getting Started
fields.description: Read actively and build the habit of working through docs.

fields.title: Welcome
fields.summary: How to get the most from these docs.
fields.content_html:
Getting Started

Reading the docs is a great way to learn. Take it slow, highlight key points, and try the exercises.

Overview

We designed this site to make reading pleasant. Use the sidebar to jump around.

Maximize Your Learning

  1. Read Actively: Pause, annotate, and bookmark.
  2. Practice What You Learn: Build tiny demos for each idea.
  3. Utilize Additional Resources: Cross-reference with blogs and videos.
  4. Stay Organized: Bookmark important sections.
  5. Engage with the Community: Join discussions and ask questions.

fields.title: HTML Intro
fields.summary: HTML basics with elements and tags.
fields.content_html:
HTML Intro

HTML structures your document using elements and attributes.

Elements

Each element has opening and closing tags.

Attributes

Attributes modify elements and provide extra metadata.
